import React, { Component } from 'react' import '@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/css/all.css' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' import './Quic.css' import ScoreCard from './ScoreCard/ScoreCard'; export default class Quick extends Component { state = { headcount: 'N/A', proc: 'N/A' } componentDidMount() { this.getHeadcount(); } getHeadcount(){ fetch('/api/users/headcount') .then(res => res.json()) .then(({ headcount, proc }) => this.setState({ headcount, proc })) } render() { return (
Availability 5%

88%

Shrinkage 5%

12%

) } }
